languages.text: {n}Крепкий детина, едва стоящий на ногах, натужно откашливается и отирает губы.{/n} "А что, я должен был лечь и сдохнуть? Ксеносы забирают тех, кто пережил арену — я сам видел челноки с людьми! Они забирают нас отсюда, слышишь?!"

{n}A hulking brute who can barely stand coughs up blood and wipes his lips.{/n} "What, was I supposed to lie down and die? The ones who survive the arena, the xenos take them away — I saw humans boarding shuttles with my own eyes! They're going to take us away from here, you hear?"
languages.original_text: {n}Крепкий детина, едва стоящий на ногах, натужно откашливается и отирает губы.{/n} "А что, я должен был лечь и сдохнуть? Ксеносы забирают тех, кто пережил арену — я сам видел челноки с людьми! Они забирают нас отсюда, слышишь?!"

traits.locale_text: {n}A burly roughneck who can barely stand coughs up blood and wipes his lips.{/n} "What, was I supposed to keel over and croak? The aliens take the arena survivors away — I saw them lead humans into shuttles myself! They are taking us from here, you hear?!"

{n}A burly roughneck who can barely stand coughs up blood and wipes his lips.{/n} "What, was I supposed to keel over and croak? The aliens take the arena survivors away — I saw them lead humans into shuttles myself! They are taking us from here, you hear?!"

{n}A hulking brute who can barely stand coughs up blood and wipes his lips.{/n} "What, was I supposed to keel over and croak? The xenos take the arena survivors away — I saw them lead humans into shuttles myself! They are taking us from here, you hear?!"

{n}A hulking brute who can barely stand coughs up blood and wipes his lips.{/n} "What, was I supposed to keel over and croak? The xenos take the arena survivors away — I saw them lead humans into shuttles myself! They are taking us from here, you hear?!"

{n}A hulking brute who can barely stand coughs up blood and wipes his lips.{/n} "What, was I supposed to lie down and die? The ones who survive the arena, the xenos take them away — I saw humans boarding shuttles with my own eyes! They're going to take us away from here, you hear?"

{n}A hulking brute who can barely stand coughs up blood and wipes his lips.{/n} "What, was I supposed to lie down and die? The ones who survive the arena, the xenos take them away — I saw humans boarding shuttles with my own eyes! They're going to take us away from here, you hear?"

languages.text: {n}なんとか立っていた巨体の男は、血を吐いて唇を拭う。{/n}「なんだ、俺が横たわって死ぬとでも？闘技場で生き残った奴は、異種族に連れて行かれる…人間がシャトルに乗り込むところをこの目で見た！奴らはここから俺達を連れて行くんだろ？」
languages.original_text: {n}A hulking brute who can barely stand coughs up blood and wipes his lips.{/n} "What, was I supposed to lie down and die? The ones who survive the arena, the xenos take them away — I saw humans boarding shuttles with my own eyes! They're going to take us away from here, you hear?"

traits.locale_text: {n}なんとか立っていた巨体の男は、血を吐いて唇を拭う。{/n}「なんだ、俺が横たわって死ぬとでも？闘技場で生き残った奴は、異種族に連れて行かれる…人間がシャトルに乗り込むところをこの目で見た！奴らはここから俺達を連れて行くんだろ？」

languages.text: {n}一个几乎站不起来的大块头咳了口血，擦了擦嘴唇。{/n}“怎么，难道我应该躺下来等死吗？那些在竞技场里活下来的人都被异形带走了，我亲眼看到那些人登上了穿梭机！他们会把我们从这里带走，你听到了吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}A hulking brute who can barely stand coughs up blood and wipes his lips.{/n} "What, was I supposed to lie down and die? The ones who survive the arena, the xenos take them away — I saw humans boarding shuttles with my own eyes! They're going to take us away from here, you hear?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一个几乎站不起来的大块头咳了口血，擦了擦嘴唇。{/n}“怎么，难道我应该躺下来等死吗？那些在竞技场里活下来的人都被异形带走了，我亲眼看到那些人登上了穿梭机！他们会把我们从这里带走，你听到了吗？”

languages.text: {n}Un homme de forte carrure, qui a visiblement le plus grand mal à rester debout, crache du sang et s'essuie les lèvres.{/n} « Et qu'est-ce que vous vouliez qu'on fasse d'autre ? Qu'on se laisse mourir ? Ceux qui survivent à l'arène, les xénos les emmènent ailleurs. J'ai vu de mes propres yeux des humains monter à bord de navettes ! Ils vont nous emmener ailleurs, vous m'entendez ? »
languages.original_text: {n}A hulking brute who can barely stand coughs up blood and wipes his lips.{/n} "What, was I supposed to lie down and die? The ones who survive the arena, the xenos take them away — I saw humans boarding shuttles with my own eyes! They're going to take us away from here, you hear?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme de forte carrure, qui a visiblement le plus grand mal à rester debout, crache du sang et s'essuie les lèvres.{/n} « Et qu'est-ce que vous vouliez qu'on fasse d'autre ? Qu'on se laisse mourir ? Ceux qui survivent à l'arène, les xénos les emmènent ailleurs. J'ai vu de mes propres yeux des humains monter à bord de navettes ! Ils vont nous emmener ailleurs, vous m'entendez ? »

languages.text: {n}Un bruto enorme que a penas se tiene en pie tose sangre y se seca los labios.{/n} «¿Y qué iba a hacer, dejarme matar? Los xenos se llevan a los que sobreviven a la arena, ¡he visto humanos subiendo a sus naves con mis propios ojos! Nos van a sacar de aquí, ¿me entiendes?».
languages.original_text: {n}A hulking brute who can barely stand coughs up blood and wipes his lips.{/n} "What, was I supposed to lie down and die? The ones who survive the arena, the xenos take them away — I saw humans boarding shuttles with my own eyes! They're going to take us away from here, you hear?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un bruto enorme que a penas se tiene en pie tose sangre y se seca los labios.{/n} «¿Y qué iba a hacer, dejarme matar? Los xenos se llevan a los que sobreviven a la arena, ¡he visto humanos subiendo a sus naves con mis propios ojos! Nos van a sacar de aquí, ¿me entiendes?».

languages.text: {n}Ein imposanter Hüne, der kaum mehr stehen kann, hustet Blut und wischt sich die Lippen.{/n} "Sollte ich mich etwa einfach zusammenrollen und sterben? Wer in der Arena überlebt, wird von den Xenos weggebracht — ich habe mit eigenen Augen gesehen, wie Menschen an Bord von Shuttles gehen! Sie bringen uns von hier weg, versteht Ihr?"
languages.original_text: {n}A hulking brute who can barely stand coughs up blood and wipes his lips.{/n} "What, was I supposed to lie down and die? The ones who survive the arena, the xenos take them away — I saw humans boarding shuttles with my own eyes! They're going to take us away from here, you hear?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein imposanter Hüne, der kaum mehr stehen kann, hustet Blut und wischt sich die Lippen.{/n} "Sollte ich mich etwa einfach zusammenrollen und sterben? Wer in der Arena überlebt, wird von den Xenos weggebracht — ich habe mit eigenen Augen gesehen, wie Menschen an Bord von Shuttles gehen! Sie bringen uns von hier weg, versteht Ihr?"

languages.text: {n}Zar zor ayakta duran devasa bir adam, öksürerek kan kusup ardından dudaklarını siliyor.{/n} "Ne yani, yere yatıp ölmeyi mi bekleseydim? Arenada hayatta kalanları zenolar alır götürür. İnsanların mekiklere bindirildiğini kendi gözlerimle gördüm! Bizi buradan götüreceklerdi, anlıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: {n}A hulking brute who can barely stand coughs up blood and wipes his lips.{/n} "What, was I supposed to lie down and die? The ones who survive the arena, the xenos take them away — I saw humans boarding shuttles with my own eyes! They're going to take us away from here, you hear?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Zar zor ayakta duran devasa bir adam, öksürerek kan kusup ardından dudaklarını siliyor.{/n} "Ne yani, yere yatıp ölmeyi mi bekleseydim? Arenada hayatta kalanları zenolar alır götürür. İnsanların mekiklere bindirildiğini kendi gözlerimle gördüm! Bizi buradan götüreceklerdi, anlıyor musun?"
